description: Defines a structured error response class for API error handling, including timestamp, status, message, and errors details.

classes.name: ErrorResponse
classes.description: A class representing a standardized format for API error responses, including timestamp, status code, message, and optional errors list.

methods.name: getTimestamp
methods.description: Returns the timestamp of the error occurrence.

methods.name: setTimestamp
methods.description: Sets the timestamp for the error response.

methods.name: getStatus
methods.description: Returns the HTTP status code associated with the error.

methods.name: setStatus
methods.description: Sets the HTTP status code for the error response.

methods.name: getErrors
methods.description: Returns the list of field-specific error messages, if available.

methods.name: setErrors
methods.description: Sets the list of field-specific error messages.
